title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction and overview Review of basic probability: combinatorial probability, conditional probability, independence, Bayes theorem Review: random variables, probability laws, common probability distributions â origins and interrelations Random number generation â Monte Carlo simulation Functions of random variables; Joint probability distribution: dependence, conditional distributions, covariance; Joint Normal distribution Reliability â historical development, applications, different measures of reliability Component reliability - time to failure, hazard functions, failure, limit states, computation of failure probability Reliability-based maintenance System reliability - representation of failure, series and parallel systems, redundancy, fault trees Probability-based design and reliability-based design codes Probability-based acceptance criteria, consequence of failure Concepts of risk, utility Target reliability
